title: Meet Jaime Barlow, the Agent to Tomorrow’s Superstars: ‘Fifteen of the World’s Top-20 Juniors Have Agents’
content:
From Cat Ferguson to Josh Tarling and Americans AJ August and Ashlin Barry, Barlow is the agent of choice for many of the peloton's rising talents.

Read the full article at Meet Jaime Barlow, the Agent to Tomorrow’s Superstars: ‘Fifteen of the World’s Top-20 Juniors Have Agents’ on Velo.
author: ahood
